gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Data from Meteoblue differs significantly from the baseline. Meteoblue indicates a high of 14.4°C (58°F) and low of 9.4°C (49°F), which is materially higher than the baseline's 10°C high and 8°C low. Rain data and wind speed from Meteoblue were not stated. With the warmer weather, it seems like a perfect day for a walk in Brussels, just don't forget a light jacket in case of unforecasted rain.
